generic.error: È avvenuto un errore, si prega di riprovare.
general.noConnection: Nessuna connessione, collegarsi ad internet e riprovare.
onBoardingCarousel.description1: Don't worry if you have trouble determining your goals, We can help you determine your goals and track your goals!
onBoardingCarousel.description2: Let’s keep burning, to achive yours goals, it hurts only temporarily, if you give up now you will be in pain forever!
onBoardingCarousel.description3: Let's start a healthy lifestyle with us, we can determine your diet every day. healthy eating is fun!
onBoardingCarousel.description4: Showcase your fitness journey and inspire others with your progress. Get inspired and share your results now!
